org.apache.hadoop.registry.client.api

类 RegistryOperationsFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.registry.client.api.RegistryOperationsFactory

  • public final class RegistryOperationsFactory
extends Object
    A factory for registry operation service instances.

    Each created instance will be returned initialized.

    That is, the service will have had Service.init(conf) applied to it —possibly after the configuration has been modified to support the specific binding/security mechanism used

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static RegistryOperations createAnonymousInstance(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
      Create and initialize an anonymous read/write registry operations instance.
      static RegistryOperations createAuthenticatedInstance(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf, String id, String password)
      Create and initialize an operations instance authenticated with write access via an id:password pair.
      static RegistryOperations createInstance(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
      Create and initialize a registry operations instance.
      static RegistryOperations createInstance(String name, org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
      Create and initialize a registry operations instance.
      static RegistryOperations createKerberosInstance(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf, String jaasContext)
      Create and initialize an secure, Kerberos-authenticated instance.

    • 方法详细资料

      • createInstance

        public static RegistryOperations createInstance(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
        Create and initialize a registry operations instance. Access writes will be determined from the configuration
        参数:
        conf - configuration
        返回:
        a registry operations instance
        抛出:
        org.apache.hadoop.service.ServiceStateException - on any failure to initialize

      • createInstance

        public static RegistryOperations createInstance(String name,
                                org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
        Create and initialize a registry operations instance. Access rights will be determined from the configuration
        参数:
        name - name of the instance
        conf - configuration
        返回:
        a registry operations instance
        抛出:
        org.apache.hadoop.service.ServiceStateException - on any failure to initialize

      • createAnonymousInstance

        public static RegistryOperations createAnonymousInstance(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
        Create and initialize an anonymous read/write registry operations instance. In a secure cluster, this instance will only have read access to the registry.
        参数:
        conf - configuration
        返回:
        an anonymous registry operations instance
        抛出:
        org.apache.hadoop.service.ServiceStateException - on any failure to initialize

      • createKerberosInstance

        public static RegistryOperations createKerberosInstance(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
                                        String jaasContext)
        Create and initialize an secure, Kerberos-authenticated instance. The user identity will be inferred from the current user The authentication of this instance will expire when any kerberos tokens needed to authenticate with the registry infrastructure expire.
        参数:
        conf - configuration
        jaasContext - the JAAS context of the account.
        返回:
        a registry operations instance
        抛出:
        org.apache.hadoop.service.ServiceStateException - on any failure to initialize

      • createAuthenticatedInstance

        public static RegistryOperations createAuthenticatedInstance(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
                                             String id,
                                             String password)
        Create and initialize an operations instance authenticated with write access via an id:password pair. The instance will have the read access across the registry, but write access only to that part of the registry to which it has been give the relevant permissions.
        参数:
        conf - configuration
        id - user ID
        password - password
        返回:
        a registry operations instance
        抛出:
        org.apache.hadoop.service.ServiceStateException - on any failure to initialize
        IllegalArgumentException - if an argument is invalid
